title: Early valve replacement versus watchful waiting in patients with severe aortic stenosis

title_detail.value: Early valve replacement versus watchful waiting in patients with severe aortic stenosis

summary: Patients with severe aortic stenosis who have no symptoms may benefit more from an aggressive strategy of early valve replacement than from a conservative watch-and-wait approach, according to new research.
